软木塞... ... 敷衍塞责 not to take the job seriously;;to skimp on the job 佛塞纪木属(拟) fothergilla 格罗塞托 grosseto.
佛塞木属（Fothergilla） — 3种，原产美国东南部。金缕梅属（Hamamelis） — 4种，原产北美洲东部、东亚。

means.word_mean: 1. any of several deciduous low-growing shrubs of the genus Fothergilla having showy brushlike spikes of white flowers in spring and fiery red and orange autumn color; grows from Alabama to the Allegheny Mountains
